Mod.Name: Lunar Cry Plus (Enemy Textures)

Mod.Description:
Lunar Cry - Enemy Texture replacement mod.
Version 2 - I reconverted images to dds using a better method. Images should be clearer, and less issues with transparencies. Original mod created by MCINDUS ffnx conversion by Nameless27 Junction8 Conversion by Slimebucket
